message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it presents significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13,500 and $12,000, which would be $12,750. Can you consider that?
